list.description:
Custom sight for #warrior

Edit: Gaiggles messed with the zoom so sight may look a bit diferent

historically inaccurate i just like the German rotary sights and wanted a glorious Russian one
#t55am

Realistic BMP-2 sights, includes both early (BPK-1-42), and later (BPK-2-42) sights. Sadly HE scale has an issue of only showing scale up to 2.4km, so I cut it off at 2.2km.

Update 1

Figured out APDS settings, added a BPK-2-42 version with left scale for APDS, and a non-realistic version of the BPK-2-42 that has range scales for both AP-T and APDS (on the left range scale, left side is APDS, right side is AP-T).

Also lowered HE-I scale to 2.2km since it got cut off at 2.4km anyway, and configured it correctly for HE belt (muzzle velocity 10m/s slower than AP-T, virtually indistinguishable a

Schindibee's fictional "SPHYRNA" Sight for Begleitpanzer 57

#customsight #sight #fictional #begleitpanzer_57 #bagel #sphyrna

This is a fully fictional sight German Begleitpanzer 57 scout tank, including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Ranging scale for armor-piercing ammo, with included deflection aiming help
(for flanked targets moving at 20 km/h, end of lines for 40 km/h...)

- Ranging funnel for armor-piercing ammoammo (configured for tank lengths of 7m, width of 3.5m, allows pretty good
accuracy for targets angled 90° to 30°)

- Ranging scale for HE ammo (right scale)

-

#gepard #flakpanzer_gepard #type87 #type_87

Zip contains both a static semi-realistic sight based on YT footage in the screenshots. Semi- realistic because IRL the fire control system adjust the visual circle. (which is not possible in WT AFAIK) ZIP and files contain a more noticeable name as per request.

To make it more game friendly I have added a fictional version of the static sight with an additional lead ring.

Both sights have a vertical offset of the cursor so that the sight can be better used in SIM optics, which you should use if you want to use 1st person sights for SPAA anyways.

Schindibee's fictional "SPHYRNA" Sight for Leopard 2K

#customsight #sight #fictional #leopard_2k #keiler #sphyrna

This is a fully fictional sight German Leopard 2K "Keiler" tank, including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Ranging scale for APFSDS ammo, with included deflection aiming help
(for flanked targets moving at 20 km/h, end of lines for 40 km/h...)

- Ranging funnel for APFSDS ammo (configured for tank lengths of 7m, width of 3.5m, allows pretty good
accuracy for targets angled 90° to 30°)

- Ranging scale for HEAT-FS ammo (right scale)

- Stadiametric rangefinder for

Funnel/Stadiametric sight for the T26
Version with and without onscreen instructions included, just drag extracted file structure into warthunder main directory and enable in game :D

Accurate out to ~2km for all shells but the composite shell, updated version with composite ballistics block coming soon

Semi-historical XM-1 Gunner Auxiliary Sight
Based on M1 GAS. Fitted with M735 APFSDS-T.
1200m circle diameter is 2mil. Crosshair width is 8mil, height is 2mil.
Each range line length on side is 4mil.
Total width is 16mil.
Stadiametric rangefinder matches with 2.4m(T-62).

So, here it is! My #semihistorical sight for #t64b #t64bv :D
Left side shows distances for 3BM22 shell and every bar = 1km
Right side shows distances for OF26 shell and every bar is 200m (first bar is 400m).
Hope you'll like it! (also i will post some other sights for this tank).

I've made #historical sight for german tanks. Ladies and gentleman - EMES15
I hope this will work for #leo2a5 #leopard2 #leopard2a5 #leopard2a4 and #leopard2k. Report any problems with this sight in comment section below.
@FaraDogs Here you are :D

Type 90 gun sight v2

added some stuff on this gun sight -> https://live.warthunder.com/post/757456/en/

Использование стандартного прицела на Т-64Б крайне неудобно тк шкалы чуть ли не накладываются друг-на-друга и цели на дистанции практически не видно потому решил сделать вот такой НЕ исторический прицел, в архиве альтернативный вариант с сеткой под 4.6км (дистанция лазерного дальномера)
Создавался под широкоформатные мониторы (16х9), за корректную работу на других не ручаюсь
#t_64b #t_64bv #t64b #t64bv

Here's a semi-realistic sight for Type 90, based on this video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=szoo2jyjEQ4

Although the sight shown on the video is not complete (has blurred section) and is an electronic Gunner Primary Sight. Because of this, it lacks rangefinding systems, ammo systems, gun zeroing etc since these are all handled by the Gunner's Periscope Sight system.

So what I've done is taken Egoistic_Lily's Type 90 sight (with permission https://live.warthunder.com/post/757456/en/ ), and tweaked it slightly, along with added ammunition range scales based on markings on the Gunner's Peris

#abrams #sights #nonhistoric #nonhistorical #simulator #simulatorbattles #tanksim

This is a all in one Gun Sight for Abrams | With Simulator Support

HESH | SABOT (Both) | HEATFS | Smoke

The Sabot Round is is switchable by it self, so when you switch between to the two sabot the aim correction will fix the distance controls.

This is nothing fancy, and it's just something basic.

This sight is used for both RB and Simulator (Arcade Too)

---- In The Yellow Box ----
---- This is for SIM Only ---
---- From top to Bottom ----

The Top Most circle is Calibrated to match where the shell will la

#abrams #sights #nonhistoric #nonhistorical

This is a all in one Gun Sight for Abrams

HESH | SABOT (Both) | HEATFS | Smoke

The Sabot Round is is switchable by it self, so when you switch between to the two sabot the aim correction will fix the distance controls.

This is nothing fancy, and it's just something basic.

I will be using this concept design to make something more "pretty" soon(tm)

Type 90 Gun Sight

inspired by Type 90 exercise video

#type90 #type_90

A simple gunsight for the Type 90, for ranges out to 5 km. Works with both shell types. Probably works on the Leopard 2A4 as well, since the shells and velocities are the same. Made with WTSightEdit 0.6 #type90

Fictional sight for Challanger mk.2 .Enjoy.

Simple Sight for FV4005 with rangefinder
#fv4005 #fv4005stageii

Schindibee's Sight for Cenurion Mk.5 AVRE ERA (UK Premium)

#customsight #sight #fictional #uk_centurion_mk_5_avre_era #centurion_mk5 #avre

This package contains a very simple sight for the AVRE Centurion, featuring ranging funnel calibrated for tank lengths of 7m (width 3.5m) and stadiametric rangefinder for tank height of 2.5m. The range scale for the 165mm HESH round has a graduation in 25m-steps, ad also included is a range scale for the 7.62mm coaxial machine gun.

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder \War Thunder\.

2) Go to test Drive (reccommen

BattleHook's Sight for Panzerwerfer 42
======================================

BEWARE: NOT ANY MORE UP TO DATE SINCE UPDATEs

#customsight #sight #panzerwerfer #rocket #fictional

based on the sight for the Panzerwerfer 42 by #Schindibee

Installation:
-------------

To install this sight, simply copy the folder into your .../Warthunder/UserSights/ folder, then select the sight under Options/Tank Battle Settings/Use alternative sight grid!
Please Note: use test drive while default grid sight selected, zoom in and press ALT+F9, press ESCAPE, select Options and select the new grid sight !!!

Abo
